title: 黑块星期五市场促销
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-11-22 19:13 编辑 

原文地址
Block Friday Marketplace Sale



Block Friday Marketplace Sale
More than 100 Minecraft Marketplace items discounted!
黑块星期五市场促销
Minecraft 市场中有一百多件商品打折！

Black Friday? Never heard of it. Block Friday, on the other hand, is the kind of excellent pun that makes us want to throw a truly spectacular sale – one where we discount over 100 pieces of content on the Minecraft Marketplace! 
[ruby=Black]黑色[/ruby]星期五？没听说过。不过我听说过[ruby=Block]黑块[/ruby]星期五，那是个很赞的双关语，在那一天 Minecraft 市场会搞一场盛大的促销——打折 100 多件商品！

“But hang on a second there, you stupid website!” you're no doubt shrieking at your screen right now. “It's not Friday yet, it's Wednesday! You're off by two whole days!” Well, you do have a point, but our Block Friday sale is so powerful and packed with great savings, that it doesn't obey your laws of dates and time. That's why this sale will be running from Wednesday the 21st until Monday the 26th so you've got almost a week to grab some great deals. Hey, there's a Friday in there somewhere, Black Friday purists!
“停一停，你个沙雕网站！”你现在肯定在屏幕面前这么喊着，“现在根本不是星期五，现在才周三！你跳过了整整两天！”啊呀，被你发现了。不过这个黑块星期五积攒了强大的力量，它不需要遵守区区人类定义的日期和时间。所以，这场促销将会从 21 号周三持续到 26 号周一，你有将近一周的时间来剁手。啥？你还对“黑色星期五”念念不忘？没关系，这期间里有一个周五！

Throughout the sale, you'll be able to save 30% on 93 pieces of great Minecraft Marketplace content (you'll find the Minecraft Marketplace on the Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Windows 10, iOS and Android versions of Minecraft). Plus, each day of the sale, we'll have two pieces of content with higher discounts! Best way to make sure you don't miss out on those is to check the Minecraft Marketplace frequently or follow us on Twitter.
促销期间，Minecraft 市场内有 93 件优质商品打七折（你可以在 Nintendo Switch、Xbox One、Windows 10、iOS 和 Android 版 Minecraft 里找到市场）。另外，每一天的促销都会有额外两件商品享有更高折扣！经常瞄一眼市场（英文） 或 关注我们的推特（英文，需魔法）可以实时了解这些促销信息。

Click here to go to the Minecraft Marketplace and enjoy the sale!
点此到达 Minecraft 市场，开始你的促销之旅（英文）

Plus! Xbox One players can take advantage of a special Minecraft Block Friday Xbox One Bundle. Get the Festive Mash-Up Pack, the Town Folk Skin Pack and 310 Minecoins all in one blocktastic bundle for an incredibly low price. Find out more about how you can get that bundle here.
另外！Xbox One 玩家可以享受特别的 黑块星期五同捆包，以极低的价格买到节日混搭包、Town Folk 皮肤包和 310 个 Minecoin。在这里（大陆 | 香港）查看获取该同捆包的方法。

Have a great Block Week/Friday!
好好玩，好好买！

Promoted content requires a version of Minecraft with Minecraft Marketplace; platform exclusions apply. Sale ends November 27, 2018 at 10 AM PST. 
以上内容必须使用带有市场的 Minecraft 版本；平台限定适用。促销在太平洋标准时间 2018 年 11 月 27 日早上 10 点（译注：北SPGoding京时间 2018 年 11 月 28 日早上 2 点）截止。
